name: All IN One Pro
description:
All in one have 10 games in One Games, This is Gift to all of you Guys....

This game is a free collection of 10 games in 1 app!


10 games for all tastes in one pack! It is the best bundle that you can imagine!

Puzzle and logic games, fast paced arcade action, racing, sports, drawing, cooking, shooting, water games, sudoku and many many more!
This collection is enough to satisfy all your gaming needs!

Run with us to the island of games called All In One Games! Choose between Lots of characters, clumsy birds, Santas and many more!
